Package io.nem.symbol.sdk.model.transaction

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.sdk.model.transaction.Transaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stored
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountAddressRestrictionTransaction, AccountKeyLinkTransaction, AccountMosaicRestrictionTransaction, AccountOperationRestrictionTransaction, AddressAliasTransaction, AggregateTransaction, HashLockTransaction, MetadataTransaction, MosaicAddressRestrictionTransaction, MosaicAliasTransaction, MosaicDefinitionTransaction, MosaicGlobalRestrictionTransaction, MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction, MultisigAccountModificationTransaction, NamespaceRegistrationTransaction, NodeKeyLinkTransaction, SecretLockTransaction, SecretProofTransaction, TransferTransaction, VotingKeyLinkTransaction, VrfKeyLinkTransaction
    public abstract class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stored
    An abstract transaction class that serves as the base class of all NEM transactions.
    Since:
    1.0

      • getMaxFee

        public java.math.BigInteger getMaxFee()
        Returns the fee for the transaction. The higher the fee, the higher the priority of the transaction. Transactions with high priority get included in a block before transactions with lower priority.
        Returns:
        fee amount

      • getSignature
